turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, give me one caramel brulée latte seasonal, one caramel macchiato, and one cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like milk for your drinks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like whipped cream for your cherry mocha and caramel brulee latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size do you want your drinks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what city is that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti cherry mocha with 2%, a venti caramel macchiato with 2%, and a caramel brulee latte with 2% to be picked up on rainbow street in las vegas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drinks will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
